name: Al Muhiy
description: Al Muhiy is one of the names of Allah in Islam, meaning 'The Giver of Life' or 'The Restorer.' It refers to Allah's power to grant life and revitalize creation.
summary: The name Al Muhiy originates from the Arabic root 'حيا' (ḥ-y-y), which is associated with life and living. This name emphasizes the belief that Allah is the source of all life and has the ability to give it and restore it. It reflects His mercy and control over the cycles of life and death.
